channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
When I add my model and stuff (ints, add model @@@@, and shit) Yeah so when I do that and spawn it I get this in the cmd:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 63995 at Class30_Sub2_Sub2.method421(Class30_Sub2_Sub2.java:328) at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:224) at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:138) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:10410) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:10282) at client.method105(client.java:8180) at client.method36(client.java:1585) at client.method102(client.java:7889) at client.method9(client.java:8772) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:123) at client.run(client.java:4588) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]
I'm new to ingame models So please help XD ("I fail at class8 stuff")
EDIT:
More info
Heres the ints Im using:
[code]if(i == 14321) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 14322; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 14321; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 14321; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Bandos Wargun"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Made by java is my bitch.".getBytes(); // Item Examine } [/code]
Btw Itz bandos wargun

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @java_is_my_bitch1 java is my bitch.
item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

When I add my model and stuff (ints, add model @@@@, and shit)
Yeah so when I do that and spawn it I get this in the cmd:

[code]Exception in thread “Thread-7” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 63995
at Class30_Sub2_Sub2.method421(Class30_Sub2_Sub2.java:328)

[/code]

I’m new to ingame models So please help XD (“I fail at class8 stuff”)

EDIT:

More info

Heres the ints Im using:

if(i == 14321) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 14322; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 14321; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 14321; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Bandos Wargun"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Made by java is my bitch.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
